meta_description: Portfolio showcasing my skills and projects.
bio_description_1: I am Ademir, a Software Engineer with a degree in Computer Science. I transform complex concepts into robust digital solutions, focusing on scalability and accessibility. My expertise spans the entire software development lifecycle—from architecture and data modeling to implementing CI/CD pipelines—utilizing technologies like TypeScript, React, Next.js, and Node.js to deliver high-performance products.
bio_description_2: In product development, I prioritize efficiency and architectural soundness. At {nexus}, a link aggregation SaaS, I served as a Full-Stack engineer: I designed the system from scratch, developed secure RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express, implemented JWT authentication, and configured CI/CD workflows with Docker. The result was a resilient application, ready to scale in production.
bio_description_3: My passion for software engineering extends beyond frameworks; I am dedicated to understanding the fundamentals. This drive motivated the creation of {simplemotionreact}, a dependency-free animation library for React. The project challenged me to architect a state machine to orchestrate lifecycle transitions, resulting in a lightweight tool that prioritizes technical transparency and performance.
